Package org.smooks.engine.delivery.sax.ng.org.apache.xerces.impl.dv

Class DTDDVFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smooks.engine.delivery.sax.ng.org.apache.xerces.impl.dv.DTDDVFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DTDDVFactoryImpl
    public abstract class DTDDVFactory
extends Object
    The factory to create and return DTD types. The implementation should store the created datatypes in static data, so that they can be shared by multiple parser instance, and multiple threads.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Sandy Gao, IBM
